mapper.select: SELECT r.name AS name, r.location AS location, r.type AS type, (SELECT c AS capacity FROM (SELECT name AS n, COUNT(name) AS c FROM RECURSO GROUP BY name) AS nc WHERE name = n) AS capacity, r.info AS info, r.id AS id, r.booking_schedule_start AS booking_schedule_start, r.booking_schedule_end AS booking_schedule_start, r.resource_state AS resource_state FROM RECURSO as r WHERE r.name LIKE #{name} AND r.type = #{type} AND (#{capacity} = 0 OR (SELECT c AS capacity FROM (SELECT name AS n, COUNT(name) AS c FROM RECURSO GROUP BY name) AS nc WHERE name = n) = #{capacity}) AND (#{location} = '' OR r.location = #{location})
mapper.insert: insert into RECURSO (name, location, type, id, info, booking_schedule_start, booking_schedule_end, resource_state) values (#{name}, #{location}, #{type}, #{id}, #{info}, #{bookingScheduleStart}, #{bookingScheduleEnd}, #{resourceState})
